definition: A term commonly employed to describe an attempt made by one individual to establish a closer connection or relationship with another person, often with the intention of fostering a deeper understanding or resolving a conflict. This word is frequently used in interpersonal contexts, particularly in discussions related to emotional or social interactions.

examples.english: He made an attempt to approach.
She dared to make an attempt to approach.
His attempt to approach was unsuccessful.
The attempt to approach was rejected.

examples.german: Ein Annäherungsversuch kann zu einer Annäherung führen.
examples.english: An attempt to approach can lead to a rapprochement.
